sarkas.potentials.base module¶

class sarkas.potentials.base.Potential[source]¶

Bases: object

Parameters specific to potential choice.

matrix¶

Potential’s parameters.

Type

array

algorithm¶

Algorithm to use for force calculations. “PP” = Linked Cell List (default). “P3M” = Particle-Particle Particle-Mesh.

Type

str

rc¶

Cutoff radius.

Type

float

type¶

Interaction potential: LJ, Yukawa, EGS, Coulomb, QSP, Moliere.

Type

str

aliases¶

Number of aliases in each direction.

Type

array, shape(3)

cao¶

Charge assignment order.

Type

int

on¶

Flag.

Type

bool

MGrid¶

Number of mesh point in each direction.

Type

array, shape(3), int

Mx¶

Number of mesh point along the \(x\) axis.

Type

int

My¶

Number of mesh point along the \(y\) axis.

Type

int

Mz¶

Number of mesh point along the \(z\) axis.

Type

int

mx_max¶

Number of aliases along the reciprocal \(x\) direction.

Type

int

my_max¶

Number of aliases along the reciprocal \(y\) direction.

Type

int

mz_max¶

Number of aliases along the reciprocal \(z\) direction.

Type

int

G_ew¶

Ewald parameter.

Type

float

G_k¶

Optimized Green’s function.

Type

array

hx¶

Mesh spacing in \(x\) direction.

Type

float

hy¶

Mesh spacing in \(y\) direction.

Type

float

hz¶

Mesh spacing in \(z\) direction.

Type

float

PP_err¶

Force error due to short range cutoff.

Type

float

PM_err¶

Force error due to long range cutoff.

Type

float

F_err¶

Total force error.

Type

float

Array of \(k_x\) values.

Type

array
